data.title: Watch American VH1 with Smart DNS
data.meta_description: Stream the best music entertainment shows from American version of VH1 anywhere outside the US with Smart DNS and Smart VPN solutions.
data.text:
Yes, you can unblock and watch VH1 outside the US with Getflix Smart DNS & Smart VPN networks. Get started free here.

Get started with a 14 days free trial.

No credit card required.

VH1 (originally conceived as Video Hits One) is an American basic cable television network owned by ViacomCBS. Originally created as a sister channel to MTV with music videos focusing mainly on a slightly older demographic than MTV by aiming at the lighter, softer side of pop music.

Similar to MTV, VH1 eventually stepped away from music videos and drifted into the direction of reality television programming with a focus on music personalities and celebrities, and shows targeting mostly female audiences. VH1 is best known for franchises such as Behind the Music, the I Loveâ¦ series, Love & Hip Hop, and many other shows. The service also features Live TV and podcast.

Current original programming on VH1 include the Love & Hip Hop, Black Ink Crew, and Basketball Wives franchises. Other noteworthy shows include RuPaul's Drag Race, reruns and new episodes of Nick Cannon Presents: Wild 'N Out (which originated on MTV), and Martha & Snoop's Potluck Dinner Party. VH1's current programming is noted to chiefly focus on urban music genres and incline towards African American personalities.

There are international variants of VH1 available in several parts of the world but the fullest catalog of videos and shows is available on the US version of the streamer. The service can be watched via a web browser, on iOS and Android devices, Roku, Apple TV, Android TV and Amazon Fire TV.

If you are traveling anywhere outside the US or love music videos but you are living in another part of the world, you wonât be able to stream its content as your IP will be detected as not coming from the US and your stream will be blocked. Unless you use Getflix Smart DNS which will make it possible for you to access VH1 outside US.

Smart DNS also opens the window for dozens of other geo-restricted services supported by Getflix from all over the world.

How to watch American VH1 outside US with Smart DNS

Smart DNS makes your IP invisible without actually changing it. Part of your traffic which is responsible for your location is redirected via our US-based DNS server making it possible for you to access American version of VH1 wherever you are. You can still stream your local services at the same time and open your local websites without any loss in your connection speed.

First, sign up for our 14-day free trial and register your IP in our service. Next, configure your device to work with Getflix Smart DNS. The setup is available for numerous devices and operating systems and is really easy, takes only a few minutes and does not require any special knowledge, additional software or extra hardware). You can also set up your home router and make all your devices connected to your home network access VH1 outside US. In case of any problems or questions, contact us for assistance or visit our Knowledge Base to search for relevant support articles. Our techs are always there to help you out.

How to stream VH1 outside the US using Getflix Smart VPN

Another available solution to stream to geo-restricted services like VH1 is to use Smart VPN. This technology is a hi-tech tool which encrypts your traffic and sends it via a dedicated virtual tunnel directly to a special server placed in the desired location. Itâs a very secure way of surfing the Internet which is very useful when you need to travel and use an unprotected public Wi-Fi spot to access your bank, your business email or send your sensitive data.

Smart VPN is a complete solution which combines the speed of Smart DNS giving you possibility to access VH1 from anywhere outside the US with the security of a VPN connection. The solution is available to our regular subscribers and is very easy to use thanks to our dedicated app available for numerous devices.

Join Getflix and use whichever solution suits your needs to stream the best music and reality shows from VH1 wherever you are.
